item.title: CVE-2024-30449|2024-03-29T16:47:05.820Z -- Booking Activities Team -- Booking Activities
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Booking Activities Team Booking Activities allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Booking Activities: from n/a through 1.15.19.
